recipesJson.name: Naughty
recipesJson.author: Dezy
recipesJson.description: This is my recipe for the holiday season. Ive always loved a nice butter rum/ butterscotch drink. With the holidays creeping up on us i knew exactly what i needed to do. This profile is reminiscent of a holiday, spiked, butter rum eggnog. With wonderful bourbon and butter rum boozy notes mixed wonderfully with the creamy dulce de leche and the sweet decadent spice of a tasty holiday eggnog.

reviews.text: Nice boozy holiday vape.  Thanks for sharing!
